DOC.brief_summary: aim study explore characteristic mean airway pressure , oscillatory amplitude power spectral density ( PSD ) oscillatory airway pressure generate various load flow rate expiration inspiration healthy subject explore best load flow rate airway secretion clearance use BreatheMAX® device
DOC.brief_title: A Study Pressure Flow Characteristics During Inspiration Expiration Using BreatheMAX® Healthy Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: For inspiratory group , resistive load 3 , 4 , 5 , 6 7 cm H2O test three flow rate : 0.2 , 0.4 , 0.6 L/sec load . In flow rate , subject instruct inspire deeply possible steady flow rate 3 second end-inspiratory pause 2-3 second inspiratory circuit follow passive exhalation . For expiratory group , resistive load flow rate test similar inspiratory group . In flow rate , subject instruct inspire deeply possible nose end-inspiratory pause 2-3 second partially force exhalation reach 1/3 expiratory reserve volume ( ERV ) least 3 second expiratory circuit
DOC.criteria: healthy subject able breathe resistive load BreatheMAX device good conscious cooperation fever
